content.Page: Trait: A Good Day to Die
content.name: A Good Day to Die
content.description: You are always willing to go down fighting with your ship. Go Down Fighting may be activated at any Hull integrity. Its scaling benefits will function as though your Hull is at 50% Hull Integrity, at most.

content.name: Ablative Shell
content.description: Taking inspiration from insects, you have installed a special system of shield generators that are able to shed damaged outer defensive layers in order to rapidly replace them with stronger, healthier defenses.

content.name: Accurate
content.description: Space Trait. Improves the accuracy of space weapons.

content.name: Active Armor Hardening
content.description: Provides scaling damage resistance rating as health decreases in ground combat.

content.name: Active Hull Hardening
content.description: Provides scaling damage resistance rating as health decreases in space combat.

content.name: Active Rerouting
content.description: Shield Heal from Kit Abilities

content.name: Acute Senses
content.description: Ground Trait. Makes it significantly easier to detect stealthed opponents and increases your exploit damage by 10%.  Some attacks can perform an Exploit for bonus damage if the target is Exposed.  This trait increases the damage done by a successful Exploit.  This trait also decreases the bonus damage you take when enemies attack you with Flanking bonuses.

content.name: Acute Senses
content.description: Ground Trait. Makes it significantly easier to detect stealthed opponents and increases your exploit damage by x%.

content.name: Adaptive Defense (ground)
content.description: Gain 40 Damage Resistance Rating divided by number of enemies targeting you

content.name: Adaptive Defense (space)
content.description: Gain 40 Damage Resistance Rating divided by number of enemies targeting you

content.name: Adaptive Offense (ground)
content.description: Gain 2.7% Critical Chance<br>On Critically Striking, 0.9% Critical Chance becomes 3% Critical Severity for 10 sec<br>Max 9% Critical Severity

content.name: Adaptive Offense (space)
content.description: Gain 2.7% Critical Chance<br>On Critically Striking, 0.9% Critical Chance becomes 3% Critical Severity for 10 sec<br>Max 9% Critical Severity

content.name: Adrenal Release
content.description: You are able to enter a berserker rage at will, drastically increasing your ability to deal damage. However, you also take more damage from all sources while in this state.

content.name: Advanced Engines
content.description: Increases ships Flight Speed & Turn Rate

content.name: Advanced Hull Reinforcement
content.description: Provides minor damage resistance in space combat.

content.name: Advanced Rapid Support
content.description: Your Career-specific Fleet ability has a reduced Recharge Time. This applies to Engineering Fleet, Tactical Fleet, and Science Fleet.

content.name: Advanced Targeting Systems
content.description: Slightly increases critical severity in space combat.

content.name: Aggressive
content.description: Ground Trait. Improves the damage you deal and makes enemies more likely to attack you over other targets.

content.name: Aggressive
content.description: Ground Trait. Improves the damage you deal and makes enemies more likely to attack you over other targets.

content.name: Agony Modulator
content.description: Ground Trait: Your kit powers that Confuse, Disable, Hold, Placate, or Root the target, or reduce Run Speed, also cause damage over time to the target.

content.name: Airiam's Augments
content.description: +Damage Over Time and Area of Effect Resistance

content.name: Airiam's Efficiency
content.description: Damage Over Time and Area of Effect Resistance

content.name: Anchored
content.description: Space Trait. If your starship remains stationary for any reason, you will begin gaining bonuses to your outgoing damage, while your passive resistances to incoming damage suffer a small penalty. As soon as you are mobile again, both the bonus and penalty will be lost.

content.name: Android
content.description: Ground Trait. Androids are very strong and sturdy.  They deal bonus melee damage and are resistant to all damage.  They are also highly resistant to Toxic Radiation and Psionic damage.  Additionally, they are also highly resistant to Confuse and Placate effects.  Due to their synthetic nature, they do not receive full benefits from standard healing, although they can be repaired and buffed by an Engineer's Quick Fix ability.

content.name: Anti-Time Entanglement Singularity
content.description: Shrinking AoE Damage Hazard, Slows and Holds Foes

content.name: Armor Penetration
content.description: Ground weapons have increased Armor Penetration

content.name: Arrest
Assault Drone Fabrication
content.description: Support Drones are fabricated with additional combat subroutines, giving them a Wide Beam secondary fire.

content.name: Assault Training
content.description: '''Ground Trait''': Increases Damage from [[Assault Weapons]].

content.name: Astrophysicist
content.description: Space Trait. Improves your Starship Particle Generators, Flow Capacitors, and Sensors stats, which enhance ship's Exotic Particle Damage, Energy Drains and Stealth Detection, as well as your Confuse and Placate resistance.

content.name: Astrophysicist
content.description: Space Trait. Improves your Starship Particle Generators, Flow Capacitors and Sensors stats, which enhance ship's Exotic Particle Damage, Energy Drains and Stealth Detection, as well as your Confuse and Placate Resistance.

content.name: Attack Pattern Delta Prime
content.description: When slotted, this trait improves [[Ability: Attack Pattern Delta|Attack Pattern Delta]] so when the target of your Attack Pattern Delta is hit, the target gains bonus Critical Chance and Critical Severity.

content.name: Authority of the Founders
content.description: Space and ground Trait. Ground: Distribute Ketracel White. Space: +Weapon Damage, +Crit Chance, +Crit Severity

content.name: Automated Protomatter Conduits
content.description: Gain Hull and Shield Regeneration when critically hit

content.name: Automated Rerouting
content.description: Chance to receive a Shield Heal when activating any Bridge Officer ability.

content.name: Auxiliary Power Configuration - Defense
content.description: In space combat you gain a bonus to Maximum Hull HP, Maximum Shield HP, Kinetic Damage Resistance Rating and Energy Damage Resistance Rating that scales based on your Auxiliary Power Level.

content.name: Auxiliary Power Configuration - Offense
content.description: In space combat you gain a damage and accuracy boost based on your Auxiliary Power Level.

content.name: Beam Barrage
content.description: Gain Beam Damage when activating Beam skills

content.name: Beam Training
content.description: Increases Damage from your [[Beam Weapon|Beam weapons]]

content.name: Berserker
content.description: Ground Trait: Scaling Damage Increase.

content.name: Bio-Molecular Shield Generator
content.description: Bio-Molecular Shield Generator creates a fixed position shield generator, in space combat, that regenerates starship shields and reduces the damage taken by starship shields for allies in the immediate area.

content.name: Bio-Organic Sedative
content.description: Ground Trait. The Voth Bio-Organic Sedative is fired in spines from their wrist, causing paralysis in enemies who threaten them. The ability holds the target for several seconds, and lowers their run speed for a short time if they break out of the hold.

content.name: Biotech Patch
content.description: Improves the effectiveness of all your abilities which restore Hull.

content.name: Bite
content.description: Activatable Ground Trait. Deals moderate melee damage and poisons the target. This attack can Exploit the target.

content.name: Bite
content.description: Activatable Ground Trait. Deals moderate melee damage and poisons the target. This attack can Exploit the target.

content.name: Blaze of Glory
content.description: Short Duration Rez on Death

content.name: Blindsense
content.description: Ground Trait. Improves your ability to spot stealthed targets and makes you immune to the effects of perception debuffs.

content.name: Blissful Agony
content.description: Ground Trait: You gain a bonus to Control and Damage Resistance and a Heal over Time effect for ten seconds when you are the target of a Control effect. May occur once every 30 seconds.

content.name: Blue Skies
content.description: Space Trait. Start at 75% Hull, you will gain increasing bonuses to Flight Speed, Turn Rate, and Defense Rating as your Hull continues to fall lower and lower.  This bonus is recalculated every 0.5 sec. Up to +50 Defense Rating and +200% Flight Speed and Turn Rate based on missing Hull PercentBonuses start at zero when at 75% Hull and scale up to max values when you are at 25% Hull

content.name: Bombardier
content.description: Ground Trait. It takes a special kind of mind to intuit how best to control the explosions of spatial charges, grenades and percussive anomalies. That mind lives on in you, even the most chaotic forces dance to your tune.

content.name: Bond With Life
content.description: Used on Self: Manage animals<br>Used on valid animal: Create Bond if animal is low Health<br>Used on other Foe: Deploy active animal for 80 sec

content.name: Borg Nanites
content.description: Ground Trait. Regenerates shields every few seconds, and decreases the length of time between each pulse of health regeneration.

content.name: Borg Nanites
content.description: Ground Trait. Regenerates shields every few seconds, and decreases the length of time between each pulse of health regeneration.

content.name: Brawler
content.description: Ground Trait:  You gain additional bonuses by engaging opponents in Melee combat.

content.name: Bulkhead Technician
content.description: '''Space Trait''': Increases your Maximum Hull Hit Points.

content.name: Cannon Training
content.description: '''Space Trait''': Increases Damage from your [[Cannons|Cannon weapons]].

content.name: Carrier Wave Shield Hacking
content.description: Using advanced Artificial Intelligence modeling inspired by the Sphere Data, you can use connections to the enemy ship caused by Tractor Beams or Intel Powers to calculate another ship's shield's modulation frequency. When your ship uses a Tractor Beam or Intel Power on an enemy, it knocks an enemy's shields offline for 5 seconds. You also gain 30% bonus Tractor Beam Damage when this trait is active.

content.name: Chrono-Capacitor Array
content.description: Reduces Bridge Officer Recharge Times

content.name: Circulatory Redundancies
content.description: Ground Trait. Provides innate resistance to the effects of toxins and fires.

content.name: Close Quarters Combatant
content.description: Melee Damage and Run Speed

content.name: Coalition Squad Tactics
content.description: Ground Trait: You gain situational bonuses, depending upon the compilation of your team. For each Player on your team, you will gain a different personal bonus depending upon their profession (Engineer, Science, or Tactical).

content.name: Coalition Starship Tactics
content.description: Space Trait:  You gain situational bonuses, depending upon the composition of your team. For each Player on your team including yourself, you will gain a different personal bonus depending upon their profession (Engineer, Science, or Tactical).

content.name: Cold Blooded
content.description: Ground Trait. Provides moderate resistance to fire damage and some resistance to plasma fire damage over time effects.

content.name: Cold Blooded
content.description: Ground Trait. Provides moderate resistance to fire damage and some resistance to plasma fire damage over time effects.

content.description: Ground Trait. Provides moderate resistance to movement debuffs, that is, anything that slows or stops your run speed.

content.description: Ground Trait. Provides moderate resistance to movement debuffs.

content.description: Damage against Controlled targets

content.name: Combined Assault
content.description: You quickly designate targets for your away team to focus fire. Your Fire on my Mark's recharge time is reduced if the target dies while it is still active.

content.name: Command Frequency
content.description:
<p>
*<u>Command Frequency</u>: Fleet Support cooldown reduced by 5 minutes. Removes "Low Health" restriction.
*<u>Improved Command Frequency</u>: Fleet Support cooldown reduced by 10 minutes. Removes "Low Health" restriction.
*<u>Superior Command Frequency</u>: Fleet Support cooldown reduced by 10 minutes, and additional level 61 Frigate is summoned. Removes "Low Health" restriction.

content.name: Concealed Repairs
content.description: When you Cloak or Placate an enemy, Heal and recharge Bridge Officer abilities.

content.name: Concussive Tachyon Emission
content.description: AOE Heavy Shields Drain

content.name: Conduit
content.description:
You gain extra benefit from using all forms of Shield Charges and Power Cells. When using a Shield Charge, you will trigger an extra amount of Shield Healing. When using a Power Cell, you will trigger an extra Damage Bonus to energy weapons.
* +10% All Energy Damage (*Power Cells Only)
* Additional Shield Heal (*Shield Charges only)

content.name: Conservation of Energy
content.description: Space Trait. This trait causes all energy weapon attacks against you to have a chance of increasing your Exotic Damage.  This damage increase stacks up to three times.  Exotic Damage powers are powers whose damage increases with the [[Skill: Starship Particle Generators|Starship Particle Generators]] skill.

content.name: Consulting the Team
content.description: Ground Trait. When the Captain's Health falls below 50%, recover half the recharge time of all Team Kit Modules and Bridge Officer Abilities. 120 second recharge.

content.description: Damage against Controlled targets

content.name: Coordinated Targeting Solution
content.description: You can quickly coordinate firing solutions on vulnerable ships. Your Fire on my Mark's recharge time is reduced if the target dies while it is still active.

content.description: Ground Trait. Provides innate resistance to the effects of toxins. Whenever you are bitten, your corrosive blood inflicts toxic damage on the attacker.

content.description: Ground Trait. Provides innate resistance to the effects of toxins. Whenever you are bitten, your corrosive blood inflicts toxic damage on the attacker.

content.name: Cryonic Visor Beam
content.description: Activatable Ground Trait. Cryonic Visor Beam fires a concentrated cold bolt that deals high damage with a chance to freeze and knock back. Additionally, the Breen breather mask and refrigeration suit serves &#91;[[w:Sic|''sic'']]&#93; the functions of an EV suit in hostile environments.

content.name: Cyclical Power Capacitors
content.description: [[Skill: Drain Expertise|Drain Expertise]] after using Energy drain or Shield Drain Bridge Officer.

content.description: Slightly increases critical severity in ground combat.

content.name: Defiance
content.description:
Defiance grants a massive damage resistance buff, a large damage buff and a healing over time effect for a short time.
This cannot be used unless your health is below 50%.

content.description: Gain Turn Rate and Inertia when activating Cannon skills<br/>*Grants Deft Cannoneer

content.description: Deploy Sensor Interference Platform - Taunt and Damage Debuff

content.name: Deprogrammed
content.description: Ground Trait. First-hand experience with the Elachi-augmented indoctrination process used by the Tal Shiar provides you with minor innoculation to Elachi gas, and a slight insight into Elachi thought processes. You ignore the damage debuffing effects of Elachi gas clouds, and gain a 3% damage bonus against Elachi targets on the ground.

content.name: Directed Dilithium Burn
content.description: You have been trained to align your ship's scanning frequencies to trigger an additional "Miniature Burn Event" upon your enemy's destruction. Any time an enemy ship is destroyed, there is a 15% chance it creates a second, larger Dilithium explosion at the site of destruction. This explosion damages any nearby enemies with Kinetic Damage, but also allows your allies to be immune to that damage.

content.name: Disabling Strikes
content.description: You will knock down your enemy when you land a critical hit in ground combat, as long as this effect is active. A successful critical hit will consume this effect temporarily, which will refresh 20 seconds later.

content.name: Distributed Shield Rerouting
content.description: Distributed Shield Rerouting causes [[Ability: Reroute Power to Shields|Reroute Power to Shields ]] to apply a weaker shield heal to nearby allies when activated.

content.name: Drone Summon Passive
content.description: Ground Trait. This ability creates a small mobile drone that will hunt down and attack nearby enemies.

content.description: 5% All Damage and 5 Accuracy Rating for 10 sec (Effect stack up to 3 times)

content.name: Dumb Luck
content.description: Ground Trait. Increases your vulnerability to mind controlling attacks, but makes you incredibly lucky.

content.description: Space Trait. Provides a bonus to Warp Core Efficiency skill, improving all power levels (Weapon, Shield, Engine and Auxiliary) of your ship when your power is low. This bonus starts at +0 at 75 power, and scales up as your power setting is lowered.

content.name: Efficient
content.description: Provides a bonus to efficiency stats, improving the effectiveness of many of your power management.

content.name: Emergency Fix
content.description: When critically hit in ground combat you have a chance to apply Emergency Fix which causes you to regenerate health and gain shield damage resistance for a short time. The chance for this effect to trigger increases as your health decreases.

content.description: Cloak Self when at Low Health

content.name: Emergency Secondary Shielding
content.description: You gain an instant heal to your shields when you are critically hit in space combat, as along as this effect is active. Being critically hit will consume the effect temporarily, which will refresh 20 sconds later.

content.name: Empathic
content.description: Ground Trait. Reduces the amount of attention you attract during battle and decreases the length of time between each pulse of health regeneration for your team.

content.name: Empathic Adaptation
content.description: Grants a chance to increase Shield Hardness by a small amount when hit in ground combat. This chance is doubled versus Psionic Damage. Can be stacked up to 5 times.

content.name: Empathic Reverberation
content.description: Grants a chance to reflect Energy Damage when hit in ground combat. Chance is doubled versus Psionic Damage. This effect cannot be triggered more than once every 10 seconds.

content.name: Empathic
content.description: Ground Trait. Reduces the amount of attention you attract during battle and increases your team's passive health regeneration.

content.name: Energized Nanites
content.description: Heals Health when Dealing Damage.

content.name: EPS Manifold Efficiency
content.description: Space Trait. When you use Emergency Power to Auxiliary, Emergency Power to Engines, Emergency Power to Shields, or Emergency Power to Weapons, this trait causes all of your other power levels to gain a moderate subsystem boost.  When you use any Battery, this trait causes all of your other power levels to gain a large subsystem boost.

content.name: EPS Overload
content.description: Space Trait. You carefully overload your EPS conduits, resulting in increased weapons performance. The exact nature of the improvement is based on which power level was highest at the time of activation.

content.name: Evasive Tactics
content.description: Control Immunity

content.name: Exotic Absorption
content.description: When struck by any Exotic Damage ability, gain 20% Shield Hardness and a minor Shield Regeneration for 10 seconds (max once per 60 seconds)

content.name: Expedient Repairs
content.description:
Your repairs expertise allows you to briefly improve the performance of allied starships that you help to restore. Additionally, when restoring an ally other than yourself, all of your Hull and Shield Healing abilities will recharge more quickly.
* To Healed Ally: Increased All Damage output and All Damage Resistance Rating
* To Self: Reduce recharge timers on Shield and Hull Healing abilities.

content.name: Eyes of the Swarm
content.description: Linked sensor grids provide extra data in real-time, allowing a carrier to gather additional battlefield information from their active hangar pets. Stacks up to 5 times max.

content.name: Failsafe Scrambler
content.description: When your hull drops below 20%, automatically Placate all foes within 10km for 5 seconds and reset Threat vs. all nearby NPCs (max once per 90 seconds)

content.Page: Trait: Feel the Weight of Our Presence
content.name: Feel the Weight of Our Presence
content.description: Space Trait. Each friendly ship on the map debuffs Damage Resistance Rating of Foes within 12km by 0.5 for 10sec, stacking up to 12.5 for 25 Allies.  Mines and Torpedos don't count, but Hangar Pets, Distress Beacons, Turrets, and all other forms of Allies do.  The sight of a ship can strike fear into the hearts of foes, but it is the people represented by that ship which form its true strength.  A fleet, an alliance, or even just a cause, what matters most is the people it champions.  [Applies "Feel the Weight of our Presence": -0.5 All Damage Resistance Rating for 10 sec

content.name: Feline Instincts
content.description: Ground Trait. Makes it significantly easier to detect stealthed opponents and increases your exploit damage by 10%. 10% chance to dodge half damage of ranged attacks. Increases Jump Height by 75%.

content.name: Field Researcher
content.description: Ground Trait. This trait improves your damage dealt to enemies affected by Control or Debuff powers.

content.name: Fleet Coordinator
content.description: '''Space Trait''': Increases your Damage based on how many players are in your party. (Self Included)

content.name: Flux
content.description: Ground Trait. Krenim ground officers specialize in creating localized energy fluxes that allow their non-weapon abilities to recharge more quickly. This effect only affects their own cooldowns, but can be substantial.

content.name: For the Empire
content.description: Ground Trait. Charge and taunt anyone who gravely wounds the Captain.

content.name: Forced Challenge
content.description: Forced challenge will tractor your target to you and deal shield damage to their forward shield facing. This is a challenge to your opponent that can not be denied.

content.name: Fortified Hull

content.name: Fragment of AI Tech

Improves Control Expertise. Improves Energy Weapon Damage based on Control Expertise (maximum 30% at 300 Control Expertise)<br><br>Many of Control's ships were left behind after the battle, positively riddled with technology gained from its portion of the Sphere data. Despite Starfleet's best efforts, it proved impossible to keep all of these advances under wraps.
:+__% Energy Weapon Damage based on Control Expertise (Max +30% at 300 Control Expertise)

<hr>
Skills that affect this ability:

content.name: Fresh From R&R
content.description:
Team Bridge Officer Abilities' minimum cooldowns are 5 seconds faster. 
Additionally, the first Control effect applied to the ship is cleansed and the ship gain 3 seconds of Control immunity thereafter. The cleanse effect has a 45 second recharge. Team abilities are: Engineering Team, Tactical Team, Science Team, Intel Team and Pilot Team. 

The moral benefits of having a well-rested crew are no easier to quantify than they are to forgo.

content.name: Fulcrum Shift
content.description: '''Space Trait:''' Flight Speed and Turn Rate Enhanced by Control Bridge Officer Abilities

*<u>Improved Going the Extra Mile</u>: +15% increased Shield and Hull Healing. If healed target is at or above 90% Hull: +15% Maximum Hit Points for 20 sec

content.name: Grace Under Fire
content.description: Space Trait. If you take more than 20% of your hitpoints in damage within a 5 second period, the cooldown on [[Ability: Miraculous Repairs|Miraculous Repairs]] is reset. This trait will only trigger when Miraculous Repairs is already on cooldown, and can only trigger once every 90 seconds.

Makes you more resistant to the effects of confuse and placate while reducing your threat generation in combat - you are less threatening so enemies are less likely to attack you. Confuse can cause you to attack your allies, while Placate can cause you to not see the target that placated you. This trait reduces the duration of those effects.

content.name: Supersaturated Katra Stones
content.description: Ground Trait. Chance when Damaged to target the attacker with an Area of Effect Psionic attack. Each attacker can only be targeted once per 30 seconds.<br><br>Vulcan Katra Stones act similarly to control rods in a primitive fission reactor, albeit with psionic energy instead of stray neutrons. When reinforced with a structural integrity field, these stones can handle far more stress than normal. The slightest disturbance from a hostile mind releases this stored energy violently, achieving a rather sudden and unpleasant psionic energy equilibrium with the supersaturated stone.

content.name: Tenavik's Counsel
content.description:
Ground Trait. Triggers off of [[Ground weapon|Weapons]] or [[Kit Module]]s that deal either [[Damage over Time]] or Antiproton Damage. When triggered, it applies an additional Antiproton DoT to your foe. Does not apply to deployed creatures and objects, such as [[Science Kit Module - Exothermic Induction Field|Exothermic Induction Field]].<br><br>
Tenavik, the [[Klingon]] monk who facilitated Captain Pike's acquisition of a time crystal, kept more than just the stones. While anecdotal rather than scientific, Pike's report of the things Tenavik showed him have born strange fruit, some of which have already been recreated in the lab.
